content.question:
Consider the following code segment.

System.out.print(*);     // Line 1
System.out.print("*");   // Line 2
System.out.println();    // Line 3
System.out.println("*"); // Line 4
The code segment is intended to produce the following output, but may not work as intended.

**
*
Which line of code, if any, causes an error?

choices.label: The code segment works as intended.

skill.text: 3.D: Explain why a code segment will not compile or work as intended and modify the code to correct the error.
